PathOfBuilding.Notes:
================================================================================= 3.14 Changes ================================================================================= The spread range of spore pods from Toxic Rain is now affected by Area of Effect modifiers. This means that having higher Area of Effect causes the resulting spore pods to spread out more. The base spread range of the spore pods has also been slightly lowered. Each Spore Pod now applies 5% less Movement Speed to nearby Enemies (previously 10%), to a maximum of 30% (previously 60%).
See my youtube video if you'd like to understand how these changes impact the build. https://youtu.be/Tbg_zyGhv-Y
Area of effect is now less effective for single target, but is still very good overall. You will likely see a larger coverage for map clearing and a slight damage reduction for single target. Until more data for spread range comes out I see no need to make any changes around AoE. I will be testing both the increased area and conc effect for single target after league start and will post updates if needed. Until then, my recommendation would be to keep building TR the same way.
================================================================================= Act 1 ================================================================================= You are looking for G-G-G and G-G-R 3 links when you can Use Caustic arrow + pierce + mirage archer until level 12 where you get toxic rain (onslaught is not good for caustic arrow because it will not trigger if the dot kills) BRUTUS TIP: Caustic arrow is going to feel weak against Brutus. Having puncture and burning arrow with you even on a 1 link will drastically increase kill speed. Put all 3 on him when you can, and try to get him moving for the increased puncture damage
After Brutus you may choose to continue to run caustic arrow or change to toxic rain. I recommend the following setup G-G-G: Toxic rain - void manipulation - mirage archer G-G-R: Caustic arrow - void manipulation - ballista totem Use dash or smoke mine for movement Vitality aura is very good to have as well
With this setup you can drop totems along the way and manually cast toxic rain
================================================================================= Act 2 ================================================================================= After Fidelitas grab SKITTERBOTS and bloodrage. Skitter bots is a large damage boost so use as soon as you can After Weaver you can get vicious proj. Get 2 for both toxic and caustic
================================================================================= Act 3 ================================================================================= This is where you can start getting 4 links from vendors, so keep an eye out. You are looking for the following:
G-G-G-G: Toxic rain - void manipulation - mirage archer - vicious proj G-G-G-R: Caustic arrow - void manipulation - ballista totem - vicious proj
Get Despair and Malevolence Despair - Lost in Love quest Malevolence, spell totem, wither - A Fixture of Fate quest (get these in act 6 if you don't want to do this quest)
Manually curse despair when needed (i.e. bosses). If you are in trade league and have the means, I HIGHLY recommend picking up profane proxy ring. Socket the despair in it and put it in your left ring slot. It changes the chill portion of skitterbots to despair on hit and you will see a massive damage boost in map clearing. Start using malevolence when you feel comfortable with mana.
If you did fixture of fate, you can now also have a 3L wither totem setup (wither - spell totem - faster casting). Drop on boss fights
================================================================================= Act 4 ================================================================================= Get Multiple totems from The Eternal Nightmare quest and put in wither totem setup. You can also get your cast when damage taken setup after The Eternal Nightmare quest.
================================================================================= Act 5-10 =================================================================================
Top resists, keep flasks relevant (may have enough beasts for staunching and warding flasks now) If you are running in to mana issues, get an enduring mana flask if you can. Otherwise you can use clarity as well, but don't level it too much because it will reserve too much mana. From here your setup is pretty much complete, and should be able to cruise through to Act 10. When you get 5 links, add swift affliction to either toxic or caustic, whichever you prefer. Grab any missing gems from Act 6 (for example if you did not do fixture of fate in Act 3) Start working towards the end game setups once you're mapping, more details about gearing choices in my build guide video. https://youtu.be/7xD-Zgz9gek
If you have ANY QUESTIONS don't hesitate to hit me up any way you can (Twitch, YouTube comments, Discord) and I will help you in any way I can.
